LanguageData.Campfire.label: campfire
LanguageData.Campfire.description: Cooks meals and produces heat, and burns out after a few days. As with all heat sources, it must be placed indoors so it has a closed space to heat. Refuelable.
LanguageData.Cooler.label: cooler
LanguageData.Cooler.description: An air-cooling machine that fits into a wall. Cool air comes out one side, while hot exhaust comes out the other. Can be used to cool down rooms during summer, or to create a walk-in freezer.
LanguageData.Heater.label: heater
LanguageData.Heater.description: An device that converts electricity into heat. It can automatically turn itself on or off to reach a specific target temperature.
LanguageData.PassiveCooler.label: passive cooler
LanguageData.PassiveCooler.description: A traditional unpowered cooler that works by water evaporation. Will run out and vanish after several days.
LanguageData.Vent.label: vent
LanguageData.Vent.description: A vent for equalizing the temperature between two rooms without allowing people to walk between them.
